# Materials

You find the R script with the coding task [here](https://ilias.uni-mannheim.de/goto.php?target=file_1496638_download&client_id=ILIAS). The solution to the task can be found [here](https://ilias.uni-mannheim.de/goto.php?target=file_1496637_download&client_id=ILIAS).

You can download the original .csv files from the BundeswahlleiterIn [here](https://ilias.uni-mannheim.de/goto.php?target=fold_1496644&client_id=ILIAS). If you struggle with the data import, you can find the necessary data frames [here](https://ilias.uni-mannheim.de/goto.php?target=file_1496640_download&client_id=ILIAS).
